thread.section_title: Home and Family: Banking / Personal Finance
thread.title: Jennifer Myers of Dwell Residential Brokerage Honored With the Real Estate Agent Award
thread.title_full: Jennifer Myers of Dwell Residential Brokerage Honored With the 2015 Five Star Real Estate Agent Award

author: Five Star Professional Representative
title: Jennifer Myers of Dwell Residential Brokerage Honored With the Real Estate Agent Award
text:
“I’ve been helping first time home buyers and sellers in the Washington, DC area for over 14 years now! I’m so happy that my own clients’ satisfaction earned me this award! That’s why I do what I do,” Jennifer Myers of Dwell Residential Brokerage. is pleased to announce Jennifer Myers, Dwell Residential Brokerage , has been chosen as one of Washington DC’s Five Star Real Estate Agents for 2015.
 Washington Post Magazine to recognize a select group of Washington DC-area real estate agents who provide quality services to their clients. Less than 7 percent of real estate agents in the area were selected. Jennifer Myers will be featured, along with other award winners, September issue.
The Five Star Real Estate Agent award program is the largest and most widely published real estate agent award program in North America. Agents are measured using an objective, in-depth research methodology with significant focus on customer feedback and overall satisfaction.
“Five Star Real Estate Agents are more than knowledgeable experts in their field. They maintain a sharp focus on building enduring relationships and demonstrate tremendous dedication to the families and individuals they serve,” Lynn Hargreaves, VP, Research and Services Operations, .
“When I bought my first home before becoming an agent, it was a disaster. It was stressful; I felt like I was not being guided to make the best decision and then I received a phone call the night before settlement that I had to bring thousands of more dollars that I did not have. I also found out afterwards I qualified for down payment assistance from the county I purchased my first home in and the experts I hired to help me never told me about it because they didn’t know about it! I never wanted that to happen to anyone else again,” Jennifer states.
Jennifer Myers’s Five Star award profile can be viewed here .
Now entering its 13th year, conducts in-depth, market-specific research in more than 45 markets across the United States and Canada to identify premium service professionals.
 contacts thousands of recent homebuyers to identify award candidates. Phone, mail and online respondents rate their real estate agent on 10 satisfaction criteria. Candidates with a qualifying client satisfaction rating move on to be evaluated on objective criteria such as experience, production levels and disciplinary and complaint history.
Real estate agents do not pay a fee to be considered or awarded. For more information, visit http://www.fivestarprofessional.com .
